column4: I'm going to SHOUT again. Bare with me. Anybody else having HUGE problems with Synaptics' dependencies resolution? I'm beginning to suspect I have done something, uhm, unorthodox.
problem is Synaptics is largely non-interactive because it's wasting my CPU figgering out the deps tree all the time
did you try sudo apt-get -f install ?
no I didn't. I always have a couple of superuser gnome-terminals around so I rarley need to use sudo. :-) apt-get -f install reports nothing
